original: Adds +1 to all five Primary Attributes
translate: Adds +1 to all five Primary Attributes

original: adds +1 to Will, Toughness and Dodge
translate: adds +1 to Will, Toughness, and Dodge

original: This Weapon does +1 base damage and has +2 To Hit
translate: This Weapon does +1 base damage and has +2 To Hit

original: This Weapon does +3 base damage and has +3 To Hit
translate: This Weapon does +3 base damage and has +3 To Hit

original: A small amount of extra acid-damage is caused on a hit
translate: A small amount of extra acid-damage is caused on a hit

original: A small amount of extra cold-damage is caused on a hit
translate: A small amount of extra cold-damage is caused on a hit

original: A small amount of extra lightning-damage is caused on a hit
translate: A small amount of extra lightning-damage is caused on a hit

original: A small amount of extra fire-damage is caused on a hit
translate: A small amount of extra fire-damage is caused on a hit

original: Increases the Dodge of the wielder by +1
translate: Increases the Dodge of the wielder by +2
